Sofia, 64 95126 Catania fabrizio DOT messina AT unict DOT it Tel. +39.095.738.3207 Office 302, building MII News and incoming events Project T-Ladies (PRIN 2020), granted by the MUR. The project started in 2022, June and will end in 2025, June. More information can be found at https://t-ladies.di.unimi.it/. I have been leading the local Unict research group Special issue (deadline November 1, 2018) on Security and Trust in Cloud application life-cycle management, Elsevier. Managing Editor: Dr. Alessandra De Benedictis, University of Naples Federico II, Italy; Dr. Fabrizio Messina, University of Catania, Italy; Prof. Douglas D. J. de Macedo, Federal University of Santa Catarina (UFSC), Brazil; Prof. Massimiliano Albanese, George Mason University, VA, USA IEEE Access Special Section (deadline October 31, 2018) on Applications on Big Data in Social Sciences, IEEE Access. Associate Editor: Prof. Pasquale De Meo University of Messina Italy, Guest Editors: Dr. Fabrizio Messina University of Catania, Italy, Prof. Michael Sheng Macquarie University, Australia, Prof. Jianguo Yao Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), China Prof. Giuseppe Di Fatta, University of Reading, UK Special issue (deadline August 6, 2018) on Recent trends in flocking control and communication for Unmanned vehicles, Computers and Electrical Engineering (Elsevier). GEs: Dr. Fabrizio Messina, Prof. Pasquale De Meo (University of Messina Italy), Prof. A. Vasilakos (Innopolis University, Russia) About me Since March 2018 I'm assistant professor at the Department of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Catania, Italy. I received the Ph.D. in Computer Science on 2009 from the Department of Mathematics and Informatics and I have been postodoctoral researcher until 2017 in the same department. My main research interests concern Trust and Recommender systems for social networks and distributed systems, discrete-event simulations, distributed and parallel computing. Since 2014 I am a founding member of the Society for Intelligent Systems (SIS) and from 2016 I am a founding member of the Autonomous and Robotic Systems Association (AURA). Affiliations March 2018 -- present: Assistant Professor at the Department of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Catania, Italy. January 2018 - March 2018: Research Fellow, University of Derby hosted by Prof. Antonio Liotta, Director of the Data Science Centre of Derby. September 2017 - December 2017: Research Fellow, Eindhoven University of Technology hosted by Prof. Antonio Liotta June 2017 - August 2017: Research Fellow, T.E.I. of Thessaly, University of Applied Science of Thessaly hosted by Prof. Ilias Savvas November 2016: Research Fellow, T.E.I. of Thessaly, University of Applied Science of Thessaly hosted by Prof. Ilias Savvas May 2009 - June 2017: Postdoctoral researcher at the Department of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Catania, Italy.
